metadata.feature_description: Manages directories that should be included in search crawling operations

test_scenarios.scenario_name: View list of all included directories

steps.action: Navigate to Admin > Settings > Site Settings > Search > Crawling tab
steps.expected: Crawling settings tab should display with Included Directories section
steps.actual: Crawling tab displayed with Included Directories section showing 'Images/' directory

steps.action: Scroll to view Included Directories section
steps.expected: List of included directories with paths should be visible
steps.actual: Included Directories section visible showing 'Images/' with full path and delete button

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Add directory to included list using folder picker

steps.action: Click 'Add Directory' button in Included Directories section
steps.actual: Folder picker dialog opened with tree view of available directories

steps.action: Expand folder tree to view available directories
steps.expected: Directory tree should expand showing all folders
steps.actual: Folder tree expanded showing directories including Badges, Containers, Images, etc.

steps.expected: Badges directory should be highlighted as selected
steps.actual: Badges directory was selected and highlighted

steps.action: Click Save to add the selected directory
steps.expected: Directory should be added to included list
steps.actual: Badges directory was successfully added to the included directories list alongside Images/

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Add duplicate directory and verify error

steps.action: Click Add Directory and select 'Images' directory which is already in the list
steps.expected: System should detect duplicate and show error
steps.actual: Selected Images directory in folder picker

steps.expected: Error message should appear indicating directory is already added
steps.actual: Error notification displayed: 'Directory duplicated. This directory Images/ is already added'

steps.action: View included directories list with Badges directory
steps.expected: List should show both Images and Badges directories
steps.actual: List showed both Images/ and Badges/ directories with delete buttons

steps.action: Click delete button for Badges directory
steps.actual: Confirmation dialog appeared asking 'Are you sure you want to delete Badges?' with Yes and No buttons

steps.action: Click Yes to confirm deletion of Badges directory
steps.expected: Badges directory should be removed from the list
steps.actual: Badges directory was successfully removed, only Images/ remains in the list

observations: The folder picker uses a tree view UI that requires clicking on arrow icons to expand directories
Duplicate directory validation works correctly, showing clear error message with the directory name
Deletion requires confirmation through a Yes/No dialog, preventing accidental deletions
Directory paths are displayed with trailing slash (e.g., 'Images/') for clarity
The UI is contained within the PersonaBar iframe structure
